original_title: The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee
overview: An intimate portrait of Washington Post executive editor Ben Bradlee, tracing his remarkable ascent from a young Boston boy stricken with polio to the one of the most pioneering and consequential journalistic figures of the 20th century.
tagline: The man who took on the White House
title: The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee
